text.text_translated: **Asteroids are large rocks that travel in space.** NASA is now working to find and record smaller asteroids that are 140 metres wide or more. NASA thinks there are about 25,000 asteroids of this size, but so far they have only found about 8,000 of them. So, there are still 17,000 that we do not know about. This is a serious problem. In 2013, a much smaller asteroid exploded over the city of Chelyabinsk in Russia. It was only 19 metres wide, but it injured 1,200 people. This shows how dangerous these middle-sized asteroids are, and they are a problem if they come close to Earth.
